# <a name="empty-inbox"></a><span data-ttu-id="b37aa-102">Leeg postvak in</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b37aa-102">Empty inbox</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b37aa-103">**Mijn Outlook.com inbox is leeg**</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b37aa-103">**My Outlook.com inbox is empty**</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="b37aa-104">Bepaalde add-ons in de Firefox-browser kunnen verhinderen dat uw inbox wordt geladen.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b37aa-104">Certain add-ons in the Firefox browser might prevent your inbox from loading.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="b37aa-105">Ga naar Firefox-ondersteuning voor informatie over het [uitschakelen of verwijderen van invoegtoepassingen](https://aka.ms/mozilla-add-ons).</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b37aa-105">Visit Firefox support to learn how to [disable or remove Add-ons](https://aka.ms/mozilla-add-ons).</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b37aa-106">**Ik wil mijn inbox leegmaken**</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b37aa-106">**I want to empty my inbox**</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b37aa-107">Als je je inbox wilt leegmaken en al je e-mails wilt verwijderen:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b37aa-107">If you want to empty your inbox and delete all your email:</span></span>

1. <span data-ttu-id="b37aa-108">Selecteer de cirkel</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b37aa-108">Select the circle</span></span> <img src='data:image/png;base64,' /> <span data-ttu-id="b37aa-109">naast [inbox](https://outlook.live.com/mail/inbox) boven aan je berichtenlijst om al je meldingen te selecteren.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b37aa-109">next to [Inbox](https://outlook.live.com/mail/inbox) at the top of your message list to select all your messages.</span></span>
1. <span data-ttu-id="b37aa-110">Aan de bovenkant van de pagina, selecteer **lege map** (of **leeg gericht** / **leeg andere** als postvak in met prioriteit is ingeschakeld).</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b37aa-110">At the top of the page, select **Empty folder** (or **Empty Focused** / **Empty Other** if Focused Inbox is turned on).</span></span>
1. <span data-ttu-id="b37aa-111">Selecteer **Alles verwijderen**.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b37aa-111">Select **Delete all**.</span></span>
1. <span data-ttu-id="b37aa-112">Om al uw verwijderde berichten te wissen, opent u de [map Verwijderde items](https://outlook.live.com/mail/deleteditems) en selecteert u **lege map** > **Alles verwijderen**, en selecteer vervolgens **herstellen items verwijderd uit deze map** boven aan de pagina en selecteer **lege map** opnieuw .</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b37aa-112">To purge all your deleted messages, open your [Deleted Items folder](https://outlook.live.com/mail/deleteditems) and select **Empty folder** > **Delete all**, then select **Recover items deleted from this folder** at the top of the page and select **Empty folder** again.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b37aa-113">Zie [E-mail verwijderen in Outlook.com](https://support.office.com/article/a9b63739-5392-412a-8e9a-d4b02708dee4?wt.mc_id=Office_Outlook_com_Alchemy) voor meer informatie.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b37aa-113">For more information, see [Delete email in Outlook.com](https://support.office.com/article/a9b63739-5392-412a-8e9a-d4b02708dee4?wt.mc_id=Office_Outlook_com_Alchemy)</span></span>
